commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Nine contests of the school idols!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: The third round will be a karaoke singing contest!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Dancing, and now singing. It's really starting to look like a school idol's contest.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I guess everyone is finally ready to hear me sing? Now's my time to shine!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Umm... Can I do this one?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What? Why?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I've been working on my expression in singing, so I was hoping to show everyone my improvement.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Shizuku, you've been getting a lot better lately. Rina-chan Board says, "Serious!"

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I've been getting better too, though.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh well, I'll give the spotlight to Shizuko this time.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Thanks guys! I'll do my best!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Who's going to sing for Î¼'s?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: How about Umi? We love Umi's voice!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Hold on, I'm not ready for this!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Umi?! Don't hide in the corner!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Well, we're going to karaoke with everyone from Nijigasaki High School, right?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Yeah, we're having a singing contest, after all.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: So I'm going to sing in front of everyone and be judged?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: That's what a singing contest is.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I'm just not ready for this. Besides, I'm probably better suited for an archery competition.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yeah, you're the only one that can do archery.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Umm... What should we do? Want to have a different contest?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: *Giggle* Sorry to make you worry. Umi's fine though.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Come on Umi! It's you and Shizuku in the spotlight!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Hey, don't drag me like that!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh boy. Is Umi going to be okay?
*Singing*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Umi...is really good at singing! Looks like there was no need to worry after all.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Everyone's really into it, too!)

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: See, I told you she'd be fine.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Right. She said she wasn't ready, but...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Once she's switched on, she goes into her own world.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Yay!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Wow, incredible! Now this is what being a school idol is about!)

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Whoa, 92 points?! That's so high!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Thank you!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: You're next, Shizuku. Do your best!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I will!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm kind of nervous. Rina-chan Board says, "Heart-pounding."

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Shizuku's been working as an actress and a school idol. She'll be fine!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah! I bet an actress like Shizuku can get into the role of a singer and pull this off.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That, I might be able to do it.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wow! Win here, and you'll have a big chance!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: But playing a role and expressing my individuality as a school idol are two completely different things.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It helps in both areas a lot, but today I don't want to play the role of a singer. I just want to sing my song.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shizuku...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I want to win, too! Maybe that's pushing my luck though.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's okay. Hearing you say that makes even cutie-pie me want to cheer for you!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: So, you better win this one!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah. We'll be routing for you, so do your best!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Thanks. Okay, time to sing!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Hmmm... 84 points. I lost.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I have to sing closer to the actual song or I won't get more points. I'm sorry!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's okay! Your song was reeeeeeally good, so I'll give you a pass this one time.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: The scoreboard says I won, but I totally loved your song.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Your singing is incredible, Shizuku! It's like your emotions turn into a voice on their own!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: That's singing with heart. It's the most important thing for a school idol.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Thank you so much! That makes me so happy!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Shizuku's singing was filled with emotion, but the score says all! Umi wins!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You both sing beautifully.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That's two for Î¼'s and one for Nijigasaki.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: This is so much fun! I'm glad we decided to do this.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Everyone in Î¼'s is amazing. Can we win the rest of the contests?)
